DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effect of ARIMIDEX on the pharmacokinetics of tamoxifen and the effects of tamoxifen on the pharmacokinetics of ARIMIDEX..
DOC.criteria: Eligible for entry into the main ATAC trial 1033IL/0029 Patients must have been taking ATAC trial medication for at least 3 months (i.e. patients must have reached at least visit 2 of the main ATAC study) Patients should be taking their medication in the mornings for at least 3 months Patients must be 100% compliant over the preceding fourteen days Excluded from entry into the main ATAC trial (1033IL/0029) Patients whose concurrent treatment includes diazepam or drugs which might affect tamoxifen steady state levels or steroid hormone status. These include ketoconazole (antifungal) or related compounds
